findings.title: CORS wildcard misconfiguration on context7.com
findings.description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * set globally. Any site can make cross-origin requests and read responses. Sensitive API endpoints may be accessible from attacker-controlled pages.

findings.title: Exposed .env file on React/Vite app
findings.description: Stripe secret key + Supabase service role key exposed at /.env. Keys were live and unrestricted.

findings.title: OpenAI API key in public JS bundle
findings.description: GPT-4 key hardcoded in main.js of a Next.js app deployed to Vercel. Key was live and unrestricted.

findings.title: Exposed /.git directory
findings.description: Full git history accessible — exposing commit history, email addresses, and internal file structure.
